Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the expiration of the authorization to the county of Genesee to impose a county recording tax on certain mortgage obligation
Summary: Extends the expiration of the authorization to the county of Genesee to impose a county recording tax on certain mortgage obligation from November 1, 2020 to November 1, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 579 of the laws of 2004, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Genesee to impose a county recording tax on certain mortgage obligation, in relation to extending the provisions of such chapter
